carpet.rule.maxVillagersInABlock.name: Max villagers in a block
carpet.rule.autoUrl.name: Auto add click event for url
carpet.rule.noBatSpawning.name: No bat spawning
carpet.rule.offlineFakePlayers.name: Use offline mode for fake players
carpet.rule.pcaSyncProtocol.name: Enable PCA Sync Protocol
carpet.rule.pcaSyncPlayerEntity.name: Set PCA Sync Protocol's entity scope
carpet.rule.emptyShulkerBoxStack.name: Empty shulker boxes can be stacked
carpet.rule.useDyeOnShulkerBox.name: Shulker box blocks can be dyed
carpet.rule.xaeroWorldName.name: Xaero world name
carpet.rule.playerSit.name: Player can sit
carpet.rule.canUseHatCommand.name: Enable hat command
carpet.rule.canUseSitCommand.name: Enable sit command
carpet.rule.obtainableReinforcedDeepSlat: When an anvil falls on 64 dropped deepslates, they will be turned in a reinforced deepslate instead of disappearing.
For jobless/nitwit villagers, after performing a set number of tick operations, skip the 1 tick operation.
carpet.rule.maxVillagersInABlock.desc: The maximum number of villagers that can be in a block, set to -1 to disable.
carpet.rule.creativeNoInfinitePickup.des: If my inventory is full, don't pick up items in creative mode.
carpet.rule.autoUrl.desc: Automatically add click event to URLs in chat.
carpet.rule.offlineFakePlayers.desc: Using offline uuid and skin so that fake players wont cause extra network traffic.
carpet.rule.pcaSyncProtocol.desc: Using PCA protocol to support sync entity and blockEntity from server
carpet.rule.pcaSyncPlayerEntity.desc: Which player entity can be sync
carpet.rule.useDyeOnShulkerBox.desc: Dyes can be used on shulker boxes, empty potion will clean color
carpet.rule.xaeroWorldName.desc: set xaero world name to sync word id to xaerominimap, "#none" is disable.
carpet.rule.playerSit.desc: Player can sit down when fast sneak 3 times.
carpet.rule.canUseHatCommand.desc: Allows all players to use the /hat command to place their main hand items in the helmet slot
carpet.rule.canUseSitCommand.desc: Allows all players to use the /sit command to sit down
carpet.rule.autoUrl.extra.0: The URL sent by players to be directly clicked and redirected by other players
Set to 0 to maintain the vanilla behavior
Set to a number greater than 0, the value will be +1 based on the setting
To prevents villagers from getting completely stuck when set to 1
carpet.rule.pcaSyncPlayerEntity.extra.1: BOT: carpet bot will be sync
carpet.rule.pcaSyncPlayerEntity.extra.2: OPS: carpet bot will be sync, and op can sync everyone's player entity data.
carpet.rule.pcaSyncPlayerEntity.extra.3: OPS_AND_SELF: carpet bot and self data will be sync, and op can sync everyone's player entity data.
carpet.rule.pcaSyncPlayerEntity.extra.4: EVERYONE: everyone's player entity will be sync
carpet.rule.emptyShulkerBoxStack.extra.0: Empty shulker boxes can stack in a player's inventory or hand
carpet.rule.emptyShulkerBoxStack.extra.1: Empty shulker boxes will not stack in other inventories, such as chests or hoppers
